words.phrase: So the king of Egypt called
words.source: H7121 Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And the king…called for', ESV 'So the king…called', NASB 'Then the king…called for' — all agree
H4428 noun masc sg cstr; KJV/ESV/NASB all 'the king of'
H3205 prep+article + Piel participle fem pl abs; KJV 'for the midwives', ESV 'the midwives', NASB 'for the midwives' — all agree
H559 Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'and said', ESV 'and said', NASB 'and said' — all agree
Prep + 3fp suffix (no Strong's); KJV 'unto them', ESV 'to them', NASB 'to them' — all agree
H4069 interrogative adverb; KJV 'Why', ESV 'Why', NASB 'Why' — all agree
H6213 Qal perf 2fp; KJV 'have ye done', ESV 'have you done', NASB 'have you done' — all agree
H1697 article + noun masc sg abs; KJV 'this thing', ESV 'this', NASB 'this thing' — KJV/NASB agree
H2088 article + demonstrative pronoun masc sg; KJV 'this', ESV 'this', NASB 'this' — all agree
H2421 Piel wayyiqtol 2fp; KJV 'have saved…alive', ESV 'and let…live', NASB 'and let…live' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV uses 'saved alive'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H3206 article + noun masc pl abs; KJV 'the men children', ESV 'the male children', NASB 'the boys' — all refer to male infants
